name: Until Forever Demo
detailed_description:
*The demo version provides a map of the playground where you can experience the control of the car in the game.

Hello, I am a personal developer who develops the games I want to achieve by continually learning programming knowledge. I have always wanted to develop a driving drift game with a retro cyber style. According to my idea, this game should have a simple drift system that makes it easy for players to play. So I spent a lot of time preparing and adjusting the driving control system in the game, making it easy to get started and easy to drift. This driving system is definitely different from the usual driving system, It is designed for fast drift.

Thank you for taking a moment to read this, I really hope you enjoy this game.

short_description: "Until Forever" is a single (no AI) driving drift game, It's fast, easy, tight, and repeatable, with elements of collection and challenges. In the game you can choose the track you like to drift and challenge the global leaderboard(Total Laps), or you just park your car on the side of the road and listen to the music.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Turkish, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Spanish - Spain
